items.creator: By David Sedaris
items.title: The Violence of the Rams
items.author: By David Sedaris
items.content: I know you can’t hold animals to human standards. That said, rams are assholes.
items.contentSnippet: I know you can’t hold animals to human standards. That said, rams are assholes.

items.creator: By Eren Orbey
items.title: Piecing Together My Father’s Murder
items.author: By Eren Orbey
items.content: I was too young to remember what happened to my dad, and no one explained it to me. So I tried to assemble the story myself.
items.contentSnippet: I was too young to remember what happened to my dad, and no one explained it to me. So I tried to assemble the story myself.

items.title: Does A.I. Lead Police to Ignore Contradictory Evidence?
items.description: Too often, a facial-recognition search represents virtually the entirety of a police investigation.
items.author: By Eyal Press

items.title: Holly Herndon’s Infinite Art
items.description: The artist and musician uses machine learning to make strange, playful work. She also advocates for artists’ autonomy in a world shaped by A.I.
items.author: By Anna Wiener

rss.creator: Rody Davis, Norbert Kozsir
rss.title: Creative Engineering
rss.description: Exploring Flutter, VR, AR, Cross-Platform Projects
rss.author: Rody Davis, Norbert Kozsir
